channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Zephyr for JIRA Test Management Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Zephyr for JIRA Test Management Plugin

item.title: CVE-2020-2154|2024-08-04T07:01:40.703Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20zephyr%20for%20jira%20test%20management%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Zephyr for JIRA Test Management Plugin 1.5 and earlier stores its credentials in plain text in a global configuration file on the Jenkins master file system.

item.title: CVE-2020-2216|2024-08-04T07:01:41.249Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20zephyr%20for%20jira%20test%20management%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins Zephyr for JIRA Test Management Plugin 1.5 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to connect to an attacker-specified HTTP server using attacker-specified username and password.

item.title: CVE-2020-2215|2024-08-04T07:01:41.109Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20zephyr%20for%20jira%20test%20management%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery vulnerability in Jenkins Zephyr for JIRA Test Management Plugin 1.5 and earlier allows attackers to connect to an attacker-specified HTTP server using attacker-specified username and password.
